StaticMeshLODGroup: The LODGroup to associate with this mesh when it is imported
VertexColorImportOption: Specify how vertex colors should be imported
VertexOverrideColor: Specify override color in the case that VertexColorImportOption is set to Override
DistanceFieldResolutionScale:
Scale to apply to the mesh when allocating the distance field volume texture.
The default scale is 1, which is assuming that the mesh will be placed unscaled in the world.
bRemoveDegenerates: Disabling this option will keep degenerate triangles found.  In general you should leave this option on.
bBuildNanite: If enabled, allows to render objects with Nanite
bOneConvexHullPerUCX: If checked, one convex hull per UCX_ prefixed collision mesh will be generated instead of decomposing into multiple hulls
bAutoGenerateCollision: If checked, collision will automatically be generated (ignored if custom collision is imported or used).
bCombineMeshes: If enabled, combines all meshes into a single mesh
